      • GameState

        public GameState(int[] hx,
                 int[] gx,
                 int dif,
                 int[] lx,
                 int[] kx,
                 int[] og)
        Constructor of GameState
        Parameters:
        hx - coordinates of hero
        gx - coordinates of guard
        dif - difficulty/type of guard
        lx - coordinates of lever
        kx - coordinates of key
        og - coordinates and number of ogres
